import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faUpload } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import axios from 'axios'; import apiBasePath from './globalVars'; function EditAlbum() { const navigate = useNavigate() const { id } = useParams() const [formData, setFormData] = useState( { artist: '', title: '', genre: '', recordLabel: '', releaseDate: '', coverImage: '' } ) useEffect( () => { Axios.get(apiBasePath + '/getalbum/' + id) .then( res => { setFormData( { artist: res.data[0].artist, title: res.data[0].title, genre: res.data[0].genre, recordLabel: res.data[0].recordlabel, releaseDate: (res.data[0].releasedate) ? res.data[0].releasedate.substring(0, 10) : '', coverImage: res.data.coverImage } ) } ) }, [] ) const handleChange = event => { setFormData( { ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value } ); }; const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); axios.put(apiBasePath + '/editalbum/' + id, formData) .then( res => { var confirm = window.confirm('Album updated') confirm ? navigate('/') : void (0) } ) .catch( err => { console.log(err); } ) }; return ( <>

Albums of the Year

Edit Album

); } export default EditAlbum
